SKT_FIRST.name: Fiery Tempest Kick
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. When attacking while granted a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>. Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>状態で攻撃時、自分の行動ゲージが<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPする。このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 대상을 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>실드</color> 보유 중 공격 시 자신의 행동 게이지가 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가합니다. 이 스킬은 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人目标。附带<color=#28d9ed>护盾</color>攻击时,使自身行动值提升<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>。该技能根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Grants Increased Critical Hit Chance for 1 turn

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Recovers Health of the caster by 20%

SKT_SECOND.name: Are You Strong?!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) When hit by an attack that targets all enemies, grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

(Triggered Effect) When an ally scores or takes a critical hit, activates <color=#28d9ed>Are You Strong?!</color> on the <color=#28d9ed>enemy with the highest Attack</color>.
Damage dealt increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack. Recovers Health and increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果)全体攻撃でダメージを受けるたびに、自分に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。

(発動効果)味方が敵を攻撃時、会心が発生した場合、もしくは敵から会心ダメージを受けた場合<color=#28d9ed>最も攻撃力が高い敵</color>に<color=#28d9ed>【強えぇヤツか!】</color>を使用する。
攻撃力の代わりに防御力が高いほどダメージがUPし、自分のHPと行動ゲージが<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>回復する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) 전체 공격으로 피격 될 때 마다 자신에게 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.

(발동 효과) 아군이 치명 공격을 하거나 당할 시 <color=#28d9ed>공격력이 가장 높은 적</color>에게 <color=#28d9ed>센 녀석이냐!</color>를 사용합니다.
공격력 대신 방어력에 비례하여 피해가 증가하며, 자신의 체력 및 행동게이지가 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 회복합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(被动效果)每当受到全体攻击时,使自身获得<color=#28d9ed>护盾</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

(触发效果)友军发动暴击或受到暴击时,对<color=#28d9ed>攻击力最高的敌人</color>发动<color=#28d9ed>厉害的家伙!</color>。
根据防御力而非攻击力等比提升伤害,且使自身生命值和行动值恢复<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Ascending Diamond Fist
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. When an enemy is defeated, <color=#28d9ed>resets</color> the skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Are You Strong?!</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack and additionally increases proportional to missing Health.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。敵を倒した時、<color=#28d9ed>【強えぇヤツか!】</color>のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>初期化</color>される。\nこのスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、残りHPが低いほどダメージが追加でUPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다. 적 처치 시 <color=#28d9ed>센 녀석이냐!</color>의 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>초기화</color> 됩니다.\n이 스킬은 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가하며, 잃은 체력에 비례하여 피해가 추가로 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使自身<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。击杀敌人时,<color=#28d9ed>厉害的家伙!</color>技能冷却时间<color=#28d9ed>重置</color>。\n该技能根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害,且根据损失生命值等比提升额外伤害量。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and own <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> increases during this Skill Chain attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、このスキルチェーン攻撃の間、自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>がUPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 자신의 스킬 체인 공격이 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가하며, 해당 스킬 체인 공격 동안 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:自身连携技能攻击伤害根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升,且该连携技能攻击期间,自身的<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>提升。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
